comments.body: This is a more correct plan. If you look at other tests in this file, `test("grouping function")` and `test("filter with grouping function")`, they both expect plans to group by `gid` first, then calculate the grouping function (which is `grouping_a`) in agg list or the filter node above.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +290,294 @@      Seq(SortOrder(grouping_a, Ascending)), true,
      Aggregate(Seq(a, b, gid),
        Seq(a, b, gid),
        Expand(
          Seq(Seq(a, b, c, nulInt, nulStr, 3L), Seq(a, b, c, a, nulStr, 1L),
